name: sap.watt.common.plugin.preview.service.PreviewRunner
description: A preview runner is repsonsible to open the preview URL in a window and control it. E.g. it can open it in a plain window or with a wrapper frame

params.name: oWindow
params.description: The window to show the preview in

params.name: oURL
params.description: The URI object which contains the URL

params.name: mCustomSettings
params.description: Custom configurations specific for this preview launch

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the button clicked on
